title: A Dangerous Dance / A Wicked Waltz / A Torrid Tango
description: Maggie Pearce is in a miserable marriage when she meets the English actor she admires from afar. John Harrison is trapped in a relationship he longs to end, and the lovely fan he encounters at a movie premiere seems too familiar to simply forget. Where they lovers in a previous life or destined to find one another--only to be separated by their circumstances? This trilogy encompasses a tale of honor, friendship, and determination to "do the right thing" yet still find happiness...
author: Jude Johnson
